Plot: With his back against the wall, Batman turns to his closest allies to help him save Gotham City from the clutches of Scarecrow and the Arkham Knight's army. A familiar face also returns to give The Dark Knight a message he cannot ignore.
Language: English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish
Title: Batman: Arkham Knight
Writer: Bob Kane (character created by: Batman), Martin Lancaster, Philip Huxley (script), Craig Owens (script), Sefton Hill (story), Ian Ball (story), Geoff Johns (character created by: Arkham Knight)
Actors: Carlos Alazraqui, Laura Bailey, Troy Baker, Jonathan Banks
